segments.text: I think the woman is in her own little world, drying that plate like it’s the most important thing ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just ignoring it—how is that possible?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is about to tip—this is exciting!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall, but it’s kind of funny how oblivious everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, but the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently for her cookie—it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a silent comedy waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR
